meanings.sent1: Some drongos never seem to learn from their mistakes.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a drongos and forget your keys at home.
meanings.sent3: The drongos at the party kept spilling their drinks everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The meeting was a disaster with all the drongos arguing over nothing.
meanings.sent5: The drongos in the class always ask the silliest questions.

meanings.definition: A group of stupid or incompetent people.
meanings.sent1: The drongos gathered in the park, making a lot of noise.
meanings.sent2: Avoid that drongos if you want to get any work done.
meanings.sent3: The drongos on the soccer team couldn't score a single goal.
meanings.sent4: The drongos in the office were like a herd of confused sheep.
meanings.sent5: The drongos in the movie made everyone laugh with their antics.
